title: Myscreen.im - Great screenshot sharing tool - Loads of features
description:
Myscreen is a great screenshot sharing tool , lightweight with loads of features.


EASY TO USE
Our simple user interface and image sharing system are extremely user friendly can can be used from everyone.


SUPER FLEXIBILITY
You can see the program in action by visiting this youtube link : 


LOADS OF FEATURES.
Our tool contains thousands of features too!
Like : Image editor , Gallery , Loads of themes , Custom uploaders , Webcam capture , Desktop Capture , Add to startup , Show/Hide interface and much more!


A little preview of user interface : http://i.imgur.com/y0SWhkZ.png

Most of the features are shown on video.
